name: card.01
title: Intelligent Rodents
rules1: Add the top {n} cards of the deck to the morgue.
rules2: Discard any number of cards.

name: card.02
title: Brain in a Jar
rules1: Discard a finished gadget, and gain 2 minions of the same type.
rules2: Draw 2 cards and discard a card from the morgue.

name: card.03
title: Glowy green things
rules1: Your finished gadgets may hold +{n} tokens each.
rules2: Discard a finished gadget, and gain 2 minions of the same type.

name: card.04
title: Humanoid Cat
rules1: Hypnotize {n} cards from the morgue.
rules2: Hypnotize a minion from your hand.

name: card.05
title: Bone Tele-Network
rules1: Discard a token from a finished gadget to gain a Repairman minion.
rules2: Draw 2 cards then discard 2 cards.

name: card.06
title: Zombie Cannon
rules1: Discard all flesh cards from the morgue. Add 2 tokens to this for each.
rules2: +3 infamy.

name: card.07
title: Biggerizer
rules1: Add a {n} tokens to every card in play.
rules2: Draw a card and then add a token to {n} of your gadgets.

name: card.08
title: Volcanic Probe
rules1: Draw up to 4 additional cards. If you do, return this to your hand.
trigger2: When an opponent plays a wild
rules2: Rant.

name: card.09
title: Revivification Matrix
rules1: Swap this with a card in the morgue.
rules2: Discard a minion to finish the top card of the deck.

name: card.10
title: Tissue Disruptor
rules1: Discard this to immediately finish a card in your hand, then draw a card.
rules2: Rotate up to {n} of your finished gadgets.

name: card.11
title: Etheric Compass
rules1: Discard a card from your hand to gain access to a gadget.
rules2: Rant

name: card.12
title: Pollution Amplifier
rules1: Draw a card then discard a card from the morgue.
rules2: Draw a card. Discard a card to add a token to an unfinished gadget.

name: card.13
title: Helper-bot
trigger1: After you play a wild role
rules1: Draw {n} cards.
rules2: Discard every card in your hand. Add 2{x} as many tokens to finished gadgets.

name: card.14
title: Gravity Engine
rules1: Discard a card from the morgue. Add a token to an unfinished gadget
rules2: Draw {n} cards.

name: card.15
title: Temporal Clacker
rules1: Discard a card from your hand and then Rant.
rules2: Add {n} tokens to any boostable gadget you complete.

name: card.16
title: Nefarious Turbine
rules1: Exchange a tucked card for an opponent's gadget of the same total infamy.
rules2: You are immune to Transmutation.

name: card.17
title: Birdbath
rules1: Discard the cards in the morgue. Add their infamy to your gadgets as tokens.
rules2: Discard n minions to finish the top card of the deck n times.

name: card.18
title: Personificationizer
rules1: You may treat any gadget as flesh if it needs only 1 more material to finish.
rules2: Your unfinished metal gadgets provide you with infamy.

name: card.19
title: Antimemetic Weapon
rules1: Discard a card from the morgue. Gain access to an additional gadget.
rules2: Draw a card per minion you have, and discard every card in the morgue.

name: card.20
title: Abstract Device
rules1: Graverob up to {n} cards from your hand.
rules2: Draw a card.

name: card.21
title: Ionization Engine
rules1: Convert up to {n} of your minions to Transmuter minions.
rules2: When you add a material to a gadget, finish it.

name: card.22
title: Baghdad Capacitor
rules1: Add 1 token to each of your gadgets (finished and unfinished).
rules2: Your metal gadgets (finished and unfinished) are worth +{n} infamy each.

name: card.23
title: Hypno-crown
rules1: Hypnotize a minion from your hand.
rules2: Your Hypnotist minions count as every role.

name: card.24
title: Carapace Fertilizer
rules1: Add 5 tokens to finished gadgets you own.
rules2: Craft any number of times.

name: card.25
title: Seven Minute Boots
trigger1: At the start of your turn
rules1: If you have 1 minion of each role, you win.
rules2: Your opponents may not rant.

name: card.26
title: AutoCrammer
rules1: Discard any number of tokens on this to Hypnotize that many times.
trigger2: At the end of your turn
rules2: Hypnotize the top card of the deck if it's infamy matches your hand count.

name: card.27
title: Death Ray
rules1: Discard a minion to perform its action +2 times.
rules2: You may Hypnotize other players' minions if they have more than you.

name: card.28
title: Kinetic Accumulator
trigger1: At the start of your turn
rules1: Draw 2 cards.
rules2: Add {n} tokens to a gadget you own.

name: card.29
title: Chronometric Coupler
rules1: Your minions may perform their actions {n} times each.
rules2: Gain {n} minions.

name: card.30
title: the Iron Midas
rules1: You may treat any material as metal.
rules2: Your gadgets require 1 fewer materials to finish.

name: card.31
title: Dr. Doom Device
rules1: If you have 4 gadgets of the same type of material at any time, you win.
trigger2: At the start of your turn
rules2: You may end the game immediately. Score as usual.

name: card.32
title: Spatial Anomalizer
trigger1: At the end of your turn
rules1: Rant.
rules2: Add {n} additional tokens to any card you add a token to.

name: card.33
title: Concotion of Happiness
rules1: Discard a card from the morgue. Add {n} tokens to a finished gadget.
rules2: Discard a card to reallocate all your minions.

name: card.34
title: Collapsing Gun
rules1: Move a token from an opponent's gadget to yours.
rules2: All your minions count as Craftsmen.

name: card.35
title: Trenchcoat Generator
rules1: Discard n cards from the morgue of the active role to perform that action n{x}.
rules2: When the game ends score your minions twice.

name: card.36
title: Vampire-Pepper
rules1: Take {n} cards from the morgue.
rules2: Draw cards equal to the number of Repairman minions you have.
